overview: The Azure Local Integrated Reference Design provides a secure and efficient architecture for integrating on-premises resources with Azure services, facilitating both traditional and containerized applications while ensuring secure connectivity and management through Azure Arc.

components.name: Control Plane
components.description: Central management interface for resource management including Azure portal and CLI.
security_considerations: Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to restrict access.
Enable multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all administrative accounts.

components.name: Azure Local Instance
components.description: Hosts virtual machines (Arc VMs) and Hyper-V for traditional applications.
security_considerations: Regularly update and patch VMs to mitigate vulnerabilities.
Use Azure Security Center to monitor VM security.

components.name: Kubernetes-based Applications
components.description: Supports containerized workloads managed via Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS).
security_considerations: Implement network policies to control traffic between pods.
Use Azure Policy to enforce security standards on AKS.
vulnerabilities: Misconfigured RBAC leading to privilege escalation.

components.name: Azure Arc
components.description: Extends Azure management capabilities to on-premises and multi-cloud environments.
security_considerations: Ensure secure communication between Azure Arc and on-premises resources.

components.name: Validated Hardware
components.description: Specifies hardware configurations certified for Azure Local.
security_considerations: Ensure hardware is sourced from trusted vendors.
Regularly review and update hardware configurations.
vulnerabilities: Hardware vulnerabilities like Spectre and Meltdown.

components.name: Switch/Router/Firewall
components.description: Manages traffic between Azure Local machines and external networks.
security_considerations: Regularly update firewall rules based on threat intelligence.

trust_boundaries.name: On-Premises to Azure Cloud
recommendations: Implement end-to-end encryption for all data in transit.
Regularly audit firewall rules and VPN configurations.
